hero.subtitle: AUTOS MALL LLC is your trusted Delivery Service Partner. We connect packages to families with speed, care, and reliability. Join our team of professional drivers or partner with us for your delivery needs.

problem.title: Why Choose AUTOS MALL?
problem.subtitle: We understand that every package tells a story. That's why we treat each delivery like it's going to our own family.
problem.problem1: Late deliveries that miss time windows
problem.problem2: Damaged packages due to careless handling
problem.solution2: Careful handling - we treat packages like our own
problem.solution3: Photo proof of delivery for every package
problem.solution4: Professional, vetted drivers you can trust

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, efficient, reliable. That's our promise.

step1.title: Package Assignment
step1.desc: Packages are assigned to our drivers through UniUni's smart routing system for maximum efficiency.

step2.title: Route Optimization
step2.desc: Our drivers follow optimized routes to ensure on-time delivery while minimizing environmental impact.

step3.title: Proof of Delivery
step3.desc: Every delivery is documented with photo proof, ensuring complete transparency and accountability.

features.title: Our Services
features.subtitle: Comprehensive delivery solutions for every need.

tracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
tracking.desc: Know exactly where your package is at all times with GPS tracking.

speed.title: Same-Day Delivery
speed.desc: Fast, reliable same-day delivery for urgent packages.

care.title: Careful Handling
care.desc: Every package is handled with care, from pickup to delivery.

drivers.title: Professional Drivers
drivers.desc: Background-checked, trained drivers who represent your brand well.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: Our team is always available to help with any delivery questions.

coverage.title: Wide Coverage
coverage.desc: Serving major areas throughout California and beyond.

drivers.title: Become a Driver
drivers.desc: Are you looking for flexible work with great earning potential? Join AUTOS MALL LLC as an Independent Contract Driver. Use your own vehicle, set your own schedule, and earn competitive pay per delivery.
drivers.req5: Ability to lift up to 50 lbs

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Whether you're looking to join our driver team or need reliable delivery services, we're here to help.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: Family-owned and operated, we bring a personal touch to every delivery.

brand.name: AUTOS MALL LLC
brand.description: Your trusted partner for last-mile delivery services. We connect packages to families with speed, care, and reliability.
